Description: Lovelier than lovely, this renovated one bedroom with small library and separate study enjoys south to west exposures and offers marvelous proximity to Harvard Sq. Hardwood floors, good ceiling height and closets. Living room with wood-burning fireplace. Bay-windowed bedroom. Renovated tiled bath with claw-foot tub. Renovated kitchen with granite counters, stainless appliances and adjacent dining area. French doors allow light to flow throughout the home. Elevator and private storage. Simply delightful!
